Name: Minimize Project Duration
Description: Reduce total time from project start to end

Name: Maximize Team Velocity
Description: Increase average story points completed per sprint

Name: Minimize Budget Variance
Description: Keep actual spend close to budgeted amount

Name: Maximize Feature Throughput
Description: Deliver as many features as possible per release

Name: Minimize Blockers
Description: Reduce number of unresolved blockers per sprint

Name: Minimize Sprint Planning Time
Description: Reduce duration of Sprint Planning meetings

Name: Maximize Release Frequency
Description: Increase number of releases in a roadmap period
